member.name: T:SFLib.Calculators
member.summary: This Class contiants usefull RGP calcuation methods.

member.name: M:SFLib.Calculators.Point_BuyCostCalc(System.Int32)
member.summary: This Method accepts a raw ability score between 7 and 18 and calculates its cost in point-buy points

member.name: M:SFLib.Calculators.modCalc(System.Int32)
member.summary: This Method accepts a raw ability score and and outputs the Ability Score Bonus

member.name: T:SFLib.DiceRollMethods
member.summary: Class Stores Methods for Generating Random Die Rolls

member.name: M:SFLib.DiceRollMethods.HeroicDieRoll(System.Int32[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: rolls 2 dice drops the lowest and adds the 3rd is always a 6
member.param: if true will not return less than 2

member.name: M:SFLib.DiceRollMethods.StandardDieRoll(System.Int32[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: rolls 4 dice drops, the lowest and adds the 3 hightest to an array
member.param: if true will not return less than 2

member.name: M:SFLib.DiceRollMethods.RollD6(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates psudo-random number between 1 and 6
member.param: if true will not return less than 2
